__e: I can't say I understand it entirely, but Mr. Crowley here... has graciously consented to my joining your training session, albeit rather late.
I know Crowley got together with your mother to deliberately do your head in, but you've done nothing wrong.
Helen Crowley made contact with me, - told me that my sister's still alive.
Crowley's dead, and the Devil is out looking for his son.
Thomas Crowley has been dead for years.
Crowley, as you know, not so easy to find.
Nobody knows where Crowley and your brother are.
You're Crowley, and the Devil should be afraid of you.
Oh, just that thing between Sam, Crowley, and myself.
